1010100111100111 1101101111010101 0 -> sum: 1000010110111100, cout: 1

0000111001010011 1100011001101111 0 -> sum: 1101010011000010, cout: 0
1111010100011100 0000010111011010 0 -> sum: 1111101011110110, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
